channel.title: 2014 on East Back Corporation
channel.description: Recent content in 2014 on East Back Corporation

item.title: Sponsored as RubyWorld Conference 2014 sponsor
item.description: As a silver sponsor, we will co-sponsor “RubyWorld Conference 2014” to be held on November 13 (Thu) and 14 (Fri), 2014 at Shimane Prefectural Industrial Exchange Center “Kunibiki Messe”.

item.title: Commissioned to operate Ruby Camp 2014 Summer and Spring 2015 from Shimane Prefecture
item.description: On May 29, 2014, we were commissioned by Shimane Prefecture to operate 2014 summer and 2015 spring. We have been operating Ruby training camps since 2011, and this is our fourth year.

item.title: Head office relocation
item.description: Today, February 1, 2014, Eastbuck Co., Ltd. has moved to The new office is close to Matsue Station, and we believe that collaboration with not only local companies but also non-prefectural companies will be more active.
